mapper.select: SELECT c.*,p.groupno,p.score FROM participate p LEFT JOIN competition c ON p.comp_id=c.id WHERE p.ath_id=#{athid}
SELECT c.*,p.groupno,p.score FROM participate p LEFT JOIN competition c ON p.comp_id=c.id WHERE p.ath_id=#{param1} AND c.name IS LIKE '%#{param2}%'
SELECT a.*,p.groupno,p.score FROM participate p LEFT JOIN athlete a ON p.ath_id=a.id WHERE p.comp_id=#{compid} ORDER BY p.score
SELECT a.*,p.groupno,p.score,t.`name` teamName FROM participate p LEFT JOIN athlete a ON p.ath_id = a.id LEFT JOIN team t ON a.teamid = t.id WHERE p.comp_id = #{compid} ORDER BY t.`name`
